body_content.explanation: with their shutters (= metal covers that protect windows) closed:
examples: Shops are closed and shuttered on Sundays.
Flights were cancelled, factories shuttered, and millions of people were left without power.

body_content.explanation: (of a business or activity) closed permanently:
examples: Money from the loan programmecould be used to reopen a shuttered factory.
Residents questioned what the city would do with the shuttered buildings.

body_content.explanation: having shutters (= wooden covers on the outside of a window):
examples: The shuttered cottages have four-poster beds and private outdoor hot tubs.
narrow, twisting streets fringed with trees, ivy-draped stone walls and shuttered farmhouses
